    FRAMES NO FRAMES

    Kount\Util

    Class Kount_Util_Khash

    public class Kount_Util_Khash

    Kount payment token hashing class.

    Example usage:
    $hashed = Kount_Util_Khash::hashPaymentToken("4111111111111111"); Expect: 411111WMS5YA6FUZA1KC $hashed = Kount_Util_Khash::hashPaymentToken("5199185454061655"); Expect: 5199182NOQRXNKTTFL11

    Package: Kount
    Subpackage: Util
    Author: Kount <custserv@kount.com>
    Copyright: 2011 Kount Inc. All Rights Reverved.

    Method Summary

     static string hashPaymentToken(string $token)
     static string hashGiftCard(int $merchantId, string $cardNumber)
     static string hash(string $data, int $len)

    Method Detail

    hashPaymentToken

    public static string hashPaymentToken(string $token)

    Create a Kount hash of a provided payment token. Payment tokens that can be hashed via this method include: credit card numbers, Paypal payment IDs, Check numbers, Google Checkout IDs, Bill Me Later IDs, and Green Dot MoneyPak IDs.

    Parameters

    $token - String to be hashed

    hashGiftCard

    public static string hashGiftCard(int $merchantId, string $cardNumber)

    Create a Kount hash of a gift card number.

    Parameters

    $merchantId - Merchant ID
    $cardNumber - Gift card number

    hash

    public static string hash(string $data, int $len)

    Compute a Kount hash of the provided input string.

    Parameters

    $data - Data to hash
    $len - Length of hash to retain
